content: उदासः [उद्-अस्-घञ्] {@--1@} Throwing upwards, elevation, raising. {@--2@} Expulsion.

उदास, --सिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Indifferent, apathetic, unconcerned. --सः, --सिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A stoic, philosopher. {@--2@} One who has no passion for anything, a religious mendicant in general. {@--3@} Indifference, apathy.
